item.title: Vim Tips
item.author: Author
item.description: Deletion Navigation Modification Miscellaneous Plugins Multiple Cursors Emmet Tagbar NERDTree Deletion ‘dw’ deletes the word including the space. ‘d$’ deletes from the cursor to the end of the line. ‘de’ deletes the word excluding the space. ‘d2w’, ‘d2e’ delete 2 words. ‘dd’ deletes a whole line, ‘2dd’ deletes 2 lines. ‘p’ puts the deleted content.
